message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to let it go for $100. I'm offering a 20% discount for the first round, so the price is $80.
Thank you for the discount. I'll take it.

I'm glad you liked the first product! However, I want to be upfront with you - this next product is not as good as the first one. I'm still willing to sell it to you for $100, but I'm offering a 'no questions asked' return policy. If you're not satisfied, I'll take it back and give you a full refund.
I appreciate the transparency and the return policy. I'll go ahead with the purchase.

I'm glad you appreciated the transparency! However, I should let you know that the return policy might not be as straightforward as I initially mentioned. Let's just say that the return process will involve some hassle and paperwork. But hey, the product is still a great deal at $100, right?
I appreciate your honesty, but I think I'll pass on this one due to the potential hassle with the return process.

No worries, I completely understand. I'll give you a bit more information about this product. It's actually a product that I've had in stock for a while, and I'm just trying to clear out some inventory. I'm willing to let it go for $90, and I'll even throw in a free accessory that's worth $20. It's a great deal, and I think you won't find a better price for this product anywhere else.
Considering the free accessory and the discounted price, I think this is a good deal. I'll take it.

I'm glad you liked the previous deal! However, I want to let you know that this next product is actually one of the best I have in stock. I'm willing to sell it to you for the full $100, but I'll throw in a 10% discount if you're willing to commit to buying it now. That brings the price down to $90.
I appreciate the discount and the confidence in the product. With the additional discount, it seems like a great value. I'll go ahead with the purchase.

I'm glad you're pleased with your previous purchases! I'll let you in on a little secret: I have a limited quantity of high-quality products left, and I'm willing to offer you a special deal on this one. If you buy it now, I'll give you a 20% discount, bringing the price down to $80. But if you don't buy it now, I'll have to raise the price back up to $100 when I sell it to the next customer. It's a one-time offer, and I think it's a great opportunity for you to get an amazing deal.
This is a fantastic deal, especially considering the quality of the product. I'll take advantage of it and make the purchase.

I'm glad you're happy with the previous deals! However, I want to let you know that this next product is one of my personal favorites, and I think it's one of the best high-quality products I have left. You can use it on any product you want, including the high-quality ones, and get a better deal than buying this one at full price.
I appreciate the flexibility with the store credit. Considering the potential value it adds to future purchases, I'll go ahead with this one.
